entry.title: Friday: Chance of drizzle. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle or rain showers or flurries. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: Flurries or drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm over higher terrain. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Friday 21 April 2023
